meanings.sent1: She consents to her friend borrowing her book.
meanings.sent2: He always consents to his children's requests.
meanings.sent3: The cat consents to being petted only when it's in the mood.
meanings.sent4: The sun consents to shine brightly upon the earth.
meanings.sent5: The teacher consents to allow extra time for the students to complete the assignment.

meanings.definition: Agreement or approval to do something
meanings.sent1: His consents were always sought before making any decisions.
meanings.sent2: The consents of all parties involved were necessary for the project to proceed.
meanings.sent3: The consents of the audience were evident through their applause.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a silent consent to his proposal.
meanings.sent5: The consents of the board members were crucial for the policy change to be implemented.
